overview: Abigail Mac is working with a new yoga instructor, the sexy blonde Cali Carter, and it turns out that she does things a little differently than a normal instructor. Cali likes to add a sexual element to her classes and Abigail doesn't seem to mind at all. As they're doing their poses, Cali touches her sensually all over and even begins to kiss Abigail. Eventually they both can't take the tension, and the yoga pants start to come off. Once they get going they don't stop, licking and touching each other's sexy bodies until they orgasm over and over, who knew yoga could be so fun?
title: Lesbian Yoga
